name: Jira Sprint Scope Slack Alerts
description: Get notified in slack when an issue is added to an active sprint in Jira

SLACK_URL.description: The URL of the Slack webhook found in the custom integration configuration in Slack

SLACK_OAUTH_TOKEN.description: The slack token that is generated when setting up your incoming webhook

JIRA_URL.description: The full url of you Jira instance with no trailing slash. Example: https://acme.atlassian.net
